Hydras/Perceptor/Kup/Talon/Windlord/Elita:


Perceptor send a heavily encripted message to Rodimus "I have an unpleasant 
surprice to Hydras, something that I never told him... All my inventions has 
a self-destruction program... i can destroy the BlackFortress If I want, if 
I use a controlled self-destruction secuence, we can free the channels and 
speak to our friends and after few minutes destroy most of the base... about 
Nightlight, I will download my weapons energy to reboot her, she will have 
enough energy to be free of whoever is taking her hostage but she could not 
defend herself"

*******************************
Hydras laughted evilish and one of his head moved closed to Tucson's eyes 
and said "Actually is true..." Hydra's Head moved quickly and other one Bite 
furiously the neck while the other spat fire in Tucson's body.

*******************************
Kup continue moving and firing against Phobia.


*******************************
Talon jumped to aside and roll, it was a calculated move. Then she stood up 
and aimed at Skyshadow's head and said "Bye, bye" and open fire

*******************************
Windlord continued moving and fighting while he scream "Rattrap we have to 
left this place pronto"

*******************************
Elita lower her body and hide behind the pipers, she waited and watched


-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2011 1:39 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Wicked Blades in the Dark!!

On the Battle field!

As Tuscon and Hydras face off, the other Predacons around them got
antsy, each one fingering his weapon and waving it, obviously wanting
to pull the trigger, but none of them daring to until they got the
order from Hydras. The sweeps above continue to fly around, their
probing beams watching the Maximals and Autobots as they move around.

And then Hydras spoke on the radio . . .

> opening his comlink to all Predacons and Decepticons's channels
> �EXECUTE THEM ALLL!!!!!�

As Hydras and Tuscon once again clashed, the Predacons eagerly reopen
the violence of the battle, unleashing the full force of their
firepower on the Maximals! Explosions rocked the ground as sadly each
of the Maximals were out numbered, several to one!

One of Kup�s blasts clips Phobia�s wing, �BLAST YOU!� she screams out
in pain as her wing tip smoked from the attack. She slowly circled in
the air, her flight not quite as graceful as it once was.

�You�re going to pay for that!� The crimson queen of fear said as an
ominous click marked the sound of her autoguns engaging. With a thrust
of force she began to open fire on Kup sending a rattling train of
bullets in his direction!

At the same time Talon attempted to race towards Tuscon, however
Skyshadow, the leader of the Fuzors stepped in the way, his weapon
cocked and ready to fire, �Where do you think you�re going?� he said
as he sneered at Talon, trying to kick and send the Maximal stumbling
back!

Straight Shot and Nightshift had both shuffled their way over to
Tuscon, but now in addition to facing Hydras, they also faced those
with him: Insecticon, Bruticus-X, Iguanus, and also Inferno. In reply
to Hydras order to execute the Maximals, their optics had brightened
as they brought their weapons to bear and powered them up.

�This is going to be fun!� Insecticon said as he cackled.

�Quit your yackin� till the job�s done.� Iguanus said as he aimed his
weapon, and like the rest opened fire!

Meanwhile at the Black tower!

Inside the walls the spider like Predacons continued their chase, the
ominous sounds of their metal legs hitting the walls creating a rapid
fire clicking sound as they pursued Rat Trap and Windlord. Four of
them came out of the shadows their bright multifaceted optics seemed
almost hungry as they moved.

The chase took them over pipes and under a bit of duct work, past a
bulk head and down a long passage way deeper and farther inside the
wall. As they ran they could see the grillwork of small vents that
gazed out into other rooms. Interestingly, one of them, as they
approached it appeared to be lit!

Outside the Ark!

Rodimus nodded as they all moved out of sight of the Ark and moved
over under the cover of several large rocks and trees. As he walked he
got a call from Perceptor . . .

> "I have an idea to let our friends escape BlackFortress area... and
> PErhaps reboot Nightlight, alltough i dont know how much of her
> former self is retained" said Perceptor to Rodimus in a heavely
> encripted message"But we have to let Tucson know, what Legacy's
> sittuation really is and this has been an unfortunate
> misunderstanding... He's loyal to us... so far I watched... "

Rodimus nodded as he looked up at Uproar and Quickstride. �It would
seem that Perceptor has vouched for Legacy. He said he has been loyal
all this time.�

He took a moment to glance around, putting Percpeptor on hold for a
few moments prepared his plan.

�This mission is going to be dangerous.� He said to Leo, Wing Caliber,
Ramulus, Uproar and Quickstride. As Rodimus spoke, he kept his voice
very low, almost as if even here he was not sure if they could be seen
or over heard. He carefully held up a small device. �But this is what
I think will get us in.�

�A Spark scrambler?� Ramulus said. �Where did you get that?�

Rodimus smiled grimly, �This was the one that Perceptor had given me a
while back. I had almost forgotten that I had it.� He glanced around
for a second, and then continued. �I believe I can modify this thing
to allow us to get past the shield.�

Leo II just looked at Rodimus, not sure what to make of what he was
saying, but he was willing to listen.

�What do you mean we can get in with that?� Wing Caliber said,
obviously mistrustful. �It scrambles spark signatures not force
fields.�

Rodimus nodded grimly, �Yes, but I believe that the shield is still
set to recognize certain spark signatures, it is just being held in
over ride mode right now.� Rodimus pulled out one more device, a small
power converter. �I believe I can disrupt the shield in a small
localized area, to create a doorway that would allow us to enter.�

Leo II�s optics brightened in recognition, �I see. You can play with
the shield�s spark recognition parameters.� He smiled ruefully, �It
wouldn�t bring down the whole shield, but it would allow us to run
through before it closed on us again.�

Wing Caliber nodded as well, �You do know the shield will adjust to it
after that.�

Rodimus nodded, �Yes, but if this works as I plan, it will only have
to work once.�

Wing Caliber and Leo II nodded in agreement.

Meanwhile inside the Ark itself

Perceptor spoke into his radio . . .

> I need confirmation for my next step, I know how to create enough
> havoc to Let Tucson and to others Scape but I need your permission."

There was a short pause, and then Rodimus' voice answered, �Of course
Perceptor. What�s your plan?�

Meanwhile little Elita, as she wondered through the base picked up a
bit of noise and the sound of a voice . . . a voice that was definitly
not Rodimus, or even anyone that she recognized.

(TAG)

Preston
